name: Accorder Paladin
oracle_text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "I fight for the suns, the surface, and everything in between."

name: Ardent Recruit
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Ardent Recruit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "We lost our homes and our kin. We won't let those rotters take our future as well."

name: Banishment Decree
oracle_text: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: "Unworthy of consecration."—Axsh, lesser cenobite

name: Choking Fumes
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on each attacking creature.
flavor_text: "Fall to your knees and welcome our embrace."—Qal-Sha, Priest of Norn

name: Divine Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: "The Phyrexians are vulnerable. Do not despair. We will prevail!"—Juryan, rebel leader

name: Frantic Salvage
oracle_text: Put any number of target artifact cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "We will mourn when there is time. For now, we survive."

name: Gore Vassal
oracle_text: Sacrifice Gore Vassal: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Then if that creature's toughness is 1 or greater, regenerate it.
flavor_text: "Rid them of their unfaithful organs. Bring new hearts to the unbelievers."—Tome of Machines, verse 1703

name: Hero of Bladehold
oracle_text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Whenever Hero of Bladehold attacks, put two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

name: Kemba's Legion
oracle_text: Vigilance
Kemba's Legion can block an additional creature for each Equipment attached to Kemba's Legion.
flavor_text: The squabble over succession was quickly replaced by the struggle to survive.

name: Leonin Relic-Warder
oracle_text: When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Leonin Skyhunter
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "The infection has spread farther than we could glimpse from the heights of Taj-Nar."

name: Loxodon Partisan
oracle_text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "This war is not about loxodon or leonin, Sylvok or Auriok. To defeat these rotters, we must do it together."

name: Master's Call
oracle_text: Put two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.

name: Mirran Crusader
oracle_text: Double strike, protection from black and from green
flavor_text: A symbol of what Mirrodin once was and hope for what it will be again.

name: Phyrexian Rebirth
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures, then put an X/X colorless Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures destroyed this way.
flavor_text: As long as one drop of the oil exists, the joyous work continues.

name: Priests of Norn
oracle_text: Vigilance
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: "May our blessings sever the tongues of the forsaken."—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Tine Shrike
oracle_text: Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: A new bird of prey—one that hunts sentience.

name: Victory's Herald
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Victory's Herald attacks, attacking creatures gain flying and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: The corruption stirred the heavens above, awaking a shining champion.

name: White Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Put X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens onto the battlefield. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor_text: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.

name: Blue Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor_text: "The Origin Query will wait. We must ensure we survive to return to it."—Pelyus, vedalken ordinar

name: Consecrated Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may draw two cards.
flavor_text: Blessed by the hands of Jin-Gitaxias.

name: Corrupted Conscience
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Karn's creation is now his master.

name: Cryptoplasm
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have Cryptoplasm become a copy of another target creature. If you do, Cryptoplasm gains this ability.
flavor_text: "If left in the enemy's shape too long, it might be lost to them."—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

name: Distant Memories
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, exile it, then shuffle your library. Any opponent may have you put that card into your hand. If no player does, you draw three cards.
flavor_text: "The fleeting shadows of his primitive self have all but vanished."—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

name: Fuel for the Cause
oracle_text: Counter target spell, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
flavor_text: "Your ideas will be discarded and your will repurposed."

name: Mirran Spy
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may untap target creature.
flavor_text: Accurate information is a precious commodity in times of war.

name: Mitotic Manipulation
oracle_text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put one of those cards onto the battlefield if it has the same name as a permanent. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "They can't even comprehend nature. How could they improve it?"—Venser

name: Neurok Commando
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Whenever Neurok Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "There's no more time for secluded study. Answers are there only for those with the courage to take them."

name: Oculus
oracle_text: When Oculus dies, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "In its gaze I saw no mercy, no recognition that I was worthy to exist."—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Quicksilver Geyser
oracle_text: Return up to two target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor_text: "Phyrexians are tenacious. That's not the same thing as clever."—Tezzeret

name: Serum Raker
oracle_text: Flying
When Serum Raker dies, each player discards a card.
flavor_text: The serum from the blinkmoths they gather greases the joints of witch engines.

name: Spire Serpent
oracle_text: Defender
Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Spire Serpent gets +2/+2 and can attack as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: A mirror to draw its eye, a rod to rouse its rage, and a sword to break its bonds.

name: Steel Sabotage
oracle_text: Choose one — Counter target artifact spell; or return target artifact to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

name: Treasure Mage
oracle_text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Turn the Tide
oracle_text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius."—Varil, Neurok partisan

name: Vedalken Anatomist
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. You may tap or untap that creature.
flavor_text: "Specimen 211 examination report. Observation: graft sublimation incomplete. Result: death. Prepare specimen 212."

name: Vedalken Infuser
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.
flavor_text: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

name: Vivisection
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Vivisection, sacrifice a creature.
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Phyrexians research with the grace of surgeons and the finesse of butchers.

name: Black Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor_text: "Under the suns, Mirrodin kneels and begs us for perfection."—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Caustic Hound
oracle_text: When Caustic Hound dies, each player loses 4 life.
flavor_text: At first, the Mirrans aimed for its exposed gut. The survivors quickly learned to do otherwise.

name: Flensermite
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

name: Flesh-Eater Imp
oracle_text: Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Sacrifice a creature: Flesh-Eater Imp gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Go for the Throat
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
flavor_text: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

name: Gruesome Encore
oracle_text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If that creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else.

name: Horrifying Revelation
oracle_text: Target player discards a card, then puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: "Ours is a glorious transmission! Behold a future where all bow to the Father of Machines."—Isila, Priest of Sheoldred

name: Massacre Wurm
oracle_text: When Massacre Wurm enters the battlefield, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 2 life.

name: Morbid Plunder
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Even the dead are raw materials for the Phyrexian vision of perfection.

name: Nested Ghoul
oracle_text: Whenever a source deals damage to Nested Ghoul, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "The chest cavity is cleared of useless meat. I know just what to do with the space."—Gyed, Vault Priest

name: Phyresis
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has infect. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: "Perfection is at hand. You have been freed of weakness and made compleat."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Phyrexian Crusader
oracle_text: First strike, protection from red and from white
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: "I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Phyrexian Vatmother
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you get a poison counter.

name: Sangromancer
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.

name: Scourge Servant
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: "The union of the oil and necrogen has produced many pleasing reactions."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Septic Rats
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever Septic Rats attacks, if defending player is poisoned, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Spread the Sickness
oracle_text: Destroy target creature, then proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
flavor_text: Life is ephemeral. Phyrexia is eternal.

name: Virulent Wound
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. When that creature dies this turn, its controller gets a poison counter.
flavor_text: Sadly, the extent of Gerkk's healing knowledge was "don't pick at it."

name: Blisterstick Shaman
oracle_text: When Blisterstick Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: A productive warren requires a good deal of prodding.

name: Burn the Impure
oracle_text: Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature has infect, Burn the Impure deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text: Flame doesn't kneel to Phyrexia.

name: Concussive Bolt
oracle_text: Concussive Bolt deals 4 damage to target player.
Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, creatures that player controls can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Shock one, awe the rest.

name: Crush
oracle_text: Destroy target noncreature artifact.
flavor_text: A golem's hands know no tenderness.

name: Galvanoth
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text: It chews open Mirrodin's husk and feeds on the outpouring of energy.

name: Gnathosaur
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: Gnathosaur gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Mirran creatures that could withstand the Phyrexian oil found an abundance of crunchy snacks.

name: Goblin Wardriver
oracle_text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "A true warrior fights with whatever's handy."—Qerk of the Secret Warren

name: Hellkite Igniter
oracle_text: Flying, haste
{1}{R}: Hellkite Igniter gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
flavor_text: Its flight sets the sky itself on fire.

name: Hero of Oxid Ridge
oracle_text: Haste
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Whenever Hero of Oxid Ridge attacks, creatures with power 1 or less can't block this turn.

name: Into the Core
oracle_text: Exile two target artifacts.
flavor_text: "They believe they're driving us back, but we're leading them to their doom."—Kethek, furnace stoker

name: Koth's Courier
oracle_text: Forestwalk
flavor_text: Koth sent partisans into the Tangle to bring survivors to the safe haven of the tunnels below Kuldotha.

name: Kuldotha Flamefiend
oracle_text: When Kuldotha Flamefiend enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Kuldotha Flamefiend deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

name: Kuldotha Ringleader
oracle_text: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Kuldotha Ringleader attacks each turn if able.
flavor_text: Being surrounded by goblins is less objectionable when they're fighting for you.

name: Metallic Mastery
oracle_text: Gain control of target artifact until end of turn. Untap that artifact. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "All will be reforged in the fires of glory."—Urabrask the Hidden

name: Ogre Resister
flavor_text: He didn't have a word for "home," but he knew it was something to be defended.

name: Rally the Forces
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Drive them back! Make their underworld into their grave!"—Koth of the Hammer

name: Red Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Red Sun's Zenith deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Shuffle Red Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

name: Slagstorm
oracle_text: Choose one — Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature; or Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.
flavor_text: "As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons."—Koth of the Hammer

name: Spiraling Duelist
oracle_text: Metalcraft — Spiraling Duelist has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "I never move the same way twice. Those rotters can't grasp chaos."

name: Blightwidow
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

name: Creeping Corrosion
oracle_text: Destroy all artifacts.
flavor_text: "We will reveal the futility of their heresy by showing them how fragile their relics are."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Fangren Marauder
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 5 life.
flavor_text: "The fangren fight without comfort of any kind. We can ask no less of ourselves."—Tilien, Sylvok partisan

name: Glissa's Courier
oracle_text: Mountainwalk
flavor_text: "So, the survivors from Oxid Ridge are on the move. Let them come and witness predation in its purest form."—Glissa

name: Green Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Search your library for a green creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Shuffle Green Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor_text: As the green sun crowned, Phyrexian prophecies glowed on the Tree of Tales.

name: Lead the Stampede
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Melira's Keepers
oracle_text: Melira's Keepers can't have counters placed on it.
flavor_text: Her warriors are the last defense against the coming storm.

name: Mirran Mettle
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Metalcraft — That creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: "Our land will not yield to Phyrexian corruption!"

name: Phyrexian Hydra
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
If damage would be dealt to Phyrexian Hydra, prevent that damage. Put a -1/-1 counter on Phyrexian Hydra for each 1 damage prevented this way.

name: Pistus Strike
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. Its controller gets a poison counter.
flavor_text: "Even a nuisance such as the pistus fly has a purpose in our new world."—Glissa

name: Plaguemaw Beast
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)
flavor_text: Phyrexia's spiral of consumption grows ever wider and darker.

name: Praetor's Counsel
oracle_text: Return all cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Praetor's Counsel. You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
flavor_text: As the Phyrexian contagion corroded Karn's body, the praetors whispered psalms to corrupt his mind.

name: Quilled Slagwurm
flavor_text: Vorinclex removed its teeth so it wouldn't waste time chewing before moving to the next kill.

name: Rot Wolf
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Rot Wolf this turn dies, you may draw a card.

name: Tangle Mantis
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: The fiercest hunters in the Tangle don't seek out the mantises. They are the mantises.

name: Thrun, the Last Troll
oracle_text: Thrun, the Last Troll can't be countered.
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{1}{G}: Regenerate Thrun.
flavor_text: His crime was silence, and now he suffers it eternally.

name: Unnatural Predation
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Domination by the strongest—that is all that matters in the Tangle now."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Viridian Corrupter
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When Viridian Corrupter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

name: Viridian Emissary
oracle_text: When Viridian Emissary dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Glissa, the Traitor
oracle_text: First strike, deathtouch
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Tezzeret, Agent of Bolas
oracle_text: +1: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−1: Target artifact becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5.
−4: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is twice the number of artifacts you control.

name: Bladed Sentinel
oracle_text: {W}: Bladed Sentinel gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Mirran partisans created hundreds of patrol sentinels to divert Phyrexian assaults from the Tangle.

name: Blightsteel Colossus
oracle_text: Trample, infect, indestructible
If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

name: Bonehoard
oracle_text: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
Equip {2}

name: Brass Squire
oracle_text: {T}: Attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
flavor_text: "I admire it. Few pull off pluck and subservience at the same time."—Ezuri, renegade leader

name: Copper Carapace
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "We will fight as they do: our flesh protected behind metal."—Tae Aquil, Viridan weaponsmith

name: Core Prowler
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
When Core Prowler dies, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

name: Darksteel Plate
oracle_text: Indestructible
Equipped creature has indestructible.
Equip {2}
flavor_text: "If there can be no victory, then I will fight forever."—Koth of the Hammer

name: Decimator Web
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, gets a poison counter, then puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: Mycosynth grew unfettered beneath the black lacuna, metastasizing into a matrix of noxious energy.

name: Dross Ripper
oracle_text: {2}{B}: Dross Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Such a creation serves no purpose other than exterminating every one of us."—Sadra Alic, Neurok strategist

name: Flayer Husk
oracle_text: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {2}

name: Gust-Skimmer
oracle_text: {U}: Gust-Skimmer gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexian smog clouds choked the skies, threatening creatures who couldn't comprehend the menace below.

name: Hexplate Golem
flavor_text: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . . even the ground must join our cause."—Ezuri, renegade leader

name: Ichor Wellspring
oracle_text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Our glorious infection has taken hold."—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

name: Knowledge Pool
oracle_text: Imprint — When Knowledge Pool enters the battlefield, each player exiles the top three cards of his or her library.

Whenever a player casts a spell from his or her hand, that player exiles it. If the player does, he or she may cast another nonland card exiled with Knowledge Pool without paying that card's mana cost.

name: Lumengrid Gargoyle
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "Anything that watches without sleep and fights without fear is a valuable ally against the Phyrexians."—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Magnetic Mine
oracle_text: Whenever another artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Magnetic Mine deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

name: Mirrorworks
oracle_text: Whenever another nontoken artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, put a token that's a copy of that artifact onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: The faces of Geth's corpse-dredgers are disturbingly similar.

name: Mortarpod
oracle_text: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, put a 0/0 black Germ creature token onto the battlefield, then attach this to it.)
Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has "Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
Equip {2}

name: Myr Sire
oracle_text: When Myr Sire dies, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: For the Phyrexians, death is not an end, nor a one-time occurrence.

name: Myr Turbine
oracle_text: {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
{T}, Tap five untapped Myr you control: Search your library for a Myr creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

name: Myr Welder
oracle_text: Imprint — {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard.
Myr Welder has all activated abilities of all cards exiled with it.
flavor_text: Memnarch designed some myr to follow the levelers and reaffix lost parts. Mirran partisans put that instinct to good use.

name: Peace Strider
oracle_text: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."—Kessla, Sylvok shaman

name: Phyrexian Digester
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: "Our cause will ripen in the fertile flesh of the unworthy."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Phyrexian Juggernaut
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Phyrexian Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
flavor_text: Where nature impedes, Phyrexians overcome.

name: Phyrexian Revoker
oracle_text: As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, name a nonland card.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.
flavor_text: Basic senses like sight and taste are reserved for those in power.

name: Pierce Strider
oracle_text: When Pierce Strider enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.
flavor_text: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Piston Sledge
oracle_text: When Piston Sledge enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +3/+1.
Equip—Sacrifice an artifact.
flavor_text: Only the goblins could make a simple machine so complex.

name: Plague Myr
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.

name: Psychosis Crawler
oracle_text: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

name: Razorfield Rhino
